name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Data Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, particularly in highly regulated sectors such as healthcare and finance. Adept at data engineering, risk assessment, and operational planning, ensuring compliance with regulatory standards like HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS. Proven track record in monitoring systems, fostering team collaboration, and executing projects within tight timelines while demonstrating excellent problem-solving capabilities and adaptability in remote environments.

Technical expertise includes **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with deep knowledge of backend frameworks such as **FastAPI** and **Django**. Skilled in creating solutions using **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue** for frontend development. Experienced with cloud-native deployments on **AWS** and **Azure**, along with implementing **microservices**, **CI/CD pipelines**, and leveraging **AI/ML technologies** for predictive analytics and automation. Well-versed in MLOps, specifically in model training and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, while also utilizing **event-driven architectures** to support data-intensive applications.

experience.responsibilities:
• Executed end-to-end **data engineering** projects, ensuring compliance with regulatory standards such as HIPAA and GDPR, leveraging technologies like **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and **GraphQL**.
• Developed robust data pipelines and workflows designed for operational planning and **risk assessment**, employing **Docker**, **Kubernetes (AKS/EKS)**, and **AWS Lambda** for scalable deployments.
• Built and maintained high-performance databases capable of handling heavy data ingestion and real-time analytics for healthcare and fintech applications, optimizing for both compliance and performance.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams, enhancing **communication** and fostering effective **team collaboration** to drive project success across diverse technology stacks including **FastAPI**, **Node.js**, and modern front-end frameworks like **React (17–18)** and **Next.js**.
• Implemented robust monitoring solutions with **Firebase Crashlytics** and **Sentry**, establishing real-time observability of application health and user engagement.
• Conducted **problem-solving** sessions to identify data integrity issues, optimizing data transmission protocols across platforms and ensuring seamless data flow.
• Managed the deployment and monitoring of machine learning models for real-time applications in risk scoring and fraud detection, utilizing tools such as **scikit-learn** and **TensorFlow** to assess impacts on data integrity.
• Developed **remote technologies** solutions that incorporate **CI/CD pipelines** with **GitHub Actions**, ensuring automated testing and deployment processes in multifaceted environments.
• Adapted to new technologies swiftly, incorporating **MLOps** practices with tools such as **MLflow** and **Airflow** to streamline model operations and enhance productivity.
• Utilized advanced data visualization techniques with **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded** to present operational KPIs and fraud trends, improving decision-making processes.
• Integrated intelligent features into applications, leveraging **Azure Cognitive Search** for effective querying of health and financial datasets, supporting operational excellence and user requirements.

Utilized **data engineering** principles to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture using **Node.js** (**NestJS/Express**) and **Python** (**FastAPI, Django**), enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Leveraged **problem-solving** skills to build interactive front-end applications with **React** (**18**), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, utilizing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
Employed **operational planning** and **monitoring** expertise to deliver real-time analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance with **regulatory compliance** standards.
Developed **ETL** pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing with a focus on **remote technologies**.
Created machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns, demonstrating strong **technical skills** in **risk assessment**.
Established **ML pipelines** for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services, exemplifying **team collaboration** and **adaptability** in project execution.

- Applied **technical skills** in **data engineering** by designing and optimizing backend services for a global e-commerce platform, ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability for core modules with **Python (FastAPI, Django)** and **Node.js (NestJS, Express)**.
- Employed **monitoring** strategies while engineering real-time features using **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, which supported responsive order updates and dynamic inventory tracking.
- Demonstrated **problem-solving** and **multitasking** skills in the development of frontend applications using **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, reinforced with **TypeScript**, **Redux Toolkit**, and **Tailwind CSS** to deliver user experiences on both web and mobile platforms.
- Utilized **operational planning** to leverage databases like **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra** for distributed data storage, maintaining fast access for **high-traffic e-commerce** workflows with performance gains.
- Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation engines utilizing **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** to tailor product listings, enhance search relevance, and improve conversion rates relying on real-time behavioral data, contributing to a **15% increase** in sales.
- Implemented **risk assessment** and **regulatory compliance** through Redis caching for product metadata and search results, resulting in a **40% improvement** in application responsiveness and reduced database load.
- Orchestrated feature flags and blue-green deployments with **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes**, ensuring effective controlling of rollouts and A/B testing, leading to a **30% decrease** in deployment-related failures.
- Created responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs utilizing **Next.js**, **Vue 3 + Nuxt**, and **HTML5/CSS3**, achieving optimum mobile-first engagement while complying with **WCAG 2.1**.
- Designed robust payment workflows integrated seamlessly with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, enforcing PCI compliance for safe handling of sensitive data during transactions.
- Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** strategies to ensure secure customer and admin access, maintaining **GDPR compliance** and safeguarding user data across the platform.
